fields.description:
h5.Steps to reproduce
# Install Confluence Questions on Confluence 5.7 or higher
# Ensure an email server has been defined
# As a user, create a question
# As another user, answer and comment on that question - include images in your replies.

h5.Expected Results
# The email notifications should show the images in full

h5.Actual Results
# The email notifications do not show the images - see testing notes below

h5.Testing Notes
# Rather than an embedded image, the Email source links to the image directly
# Enabling anonymous access to Confluence and Confluence questions will permit images in Answers to be displayed correctly
# Comments with images will return "Unknown attachments" when viewing them in Confluence (and will also display incorrectly in the email notification)
fields.summary: Email notifications for Answers or Comments that contain images will not be displayed
Unable to perform 'delete completely' from bulk actions

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-47202].
  {panel}

1. Google "execute jql programmatically". Observe: the first result leads to a question on Answers, https://answers.atlassian.com/questions/40750/execute-jql-query-programatically-in-jira-4-0-2.
2. Open Answers and type the same query in the search box.
Expected: the same question as in 1 is returned.
Observed: nothing is returned at all.

Note that the title is misspelt (only one 'm'), maybe this prevents the search from finding it. Anyway, it should tolerate misspellings.
fields.summary: Search should be more tolerant to misspellings

A popup window open displaying the image, but profile pictures appear on top of the image.

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-47192].
  {panel}

h3. Summary
Anonymous/Limited users may see private questions (questions that are linked to a private space) in the _Popular_ tab or in _Topics_ counters.

Note: Limited users are users without permission to view the private space that contains questions.

h3. Environment
* Confluence 5.8.18 
* Questions plug in 2.4.11

h3. Steps to Reproduce
# *Prepare test scenario*:
## enable anonymous user
## add several global questions
## answer them while they are still global and unrestricted
## create a private space
## create and configure a limited user (no view access to the private space)
## restrict visibility of the private space
## move one answered question to the private space
## leave at least one global question as it is
## create a new question and answer it in a private space (same topics as before)
## add the topic "private" to all questions that belong to a private space

* Test *Symptom #1* - anonymous/limited users see private questions on _popular_ tab:
*# log in with anonymous or limited user
*# navigate to questions and observe popular and recent questions tabs

Actual results (anonymous user): In the Popular tab, the anonymous user sees questions that belong to a private space. Clicking on a restricted question redirects the user to the login page. See attached screenshot for example:
 !anonymous_view_popular_tab.png|thumbnail! 
Actual results (limited user): In the Popular tab the limited user sees questions that belong to a private space. Clicking on a restricted question redirects the limited user to a "Page Not Found" page.

Expected results: neither anonymous nor limited users should see questions/answers that belong to a private space. This seems to work as expected in the Recent and Unanswered tabs. See attached screenshot for example:
 !anonymous_view_recent_tab_OK.png|thumbnail! 

* Test *Symptom #2* - anonymous/limited users see topic counters that include private questions when browsing questions by topic:
*# log in with anonoymouse or limited user
*# navigate to questions > Topics
*# Click on "private" topic

Actual results (anonymous/limited users): Even though the "private" topic has a counter indicating a number of questions greater than 0, clicking on that topic leads the user to a potentially empty page. See attached screenshots below for an example of "private" topic leading the user to an empty page:
 !anonymous_view_private_topics_counter_01.png|thumbnail! 
 !anonymous_view_private_topics_counter_02_empty_page.png|thumbnail! 

Expected results: The topic counter should not lead users to empty pages. Ideally the counters would include only questions that are visible to the current user.

h3. Notes
When anonymous/limited users click on the private question link, they are prompted for credentials or redirected to a "page not found". Therefore, this bug report was raised with "Minor" symptom severity.

h3.Workaround

* Create the questions directly in a private space to avoid symptom#1 (symptom #2 still happens).
* I could not find a way to "fix" view permissions whenever symptom#1 is observed.
fields.summary: Users without view permission to a private space may still see private questions in Popular tab, Topic counters, or search results

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-47191].
  {panel}

In Atlassian Answers, you can click the date of an answer to get a link to that answer. If the answer is on the first page, the link works fine. If the answer is on the second (or third, fourth, etc) page, the link loads the first page of answers, which doesn't include the desired answer.

This can be resolved by simply adding a "?page=2" to the end of the URL.

For example, see difference between these:
https://answers.atlassian.com/questions/149631/answers/3032944
https://answers.atlassian.com/questions/149631/answers/3032944?page=3
fields.summary: Direct links to answers on a page other than first
Missing Edit link for Topics in All Topics section after scrolling down

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-47189].
  {panel}

h3. Summary
When trying to save or edit a question with an image attachment, an error is thrown, and the question cannot be saved. This also applies to questions with attachments that are edited after the fact (i.e. questions with attachments cannot be edited). 

h3. Steps to Reproduce
# Ask a question in Questions for Confluence
# Add an image attachment in the question
# Add a “Popular topic”
# Click *Save*

h3. Expected Results
The question is saved and posted.

h3. Actual Results
The below exception is thrown in the Confluence Log file:
{noformat}
org.springframework.dao.DataIntegrityViolationException: Hibernate operation: Could not execute JDBC batch update; SQL []; Batch entry 0 insert into IMAGEDETAILS (HEIGHT, WIDTH, MIMETYPE, ATTACHMENTID) values (482, 630, 'image/jpeg', 17137749) was aborted. Call getNextException to see the cause.; nested exception is java.sql.BatchUpdateException: Batch entry 0 insert into IMAGEDETAILS (HEIGHT, WIDTH, MIMETYPE, ATTACHMENTID) values (482, 630, 'image/jpeg', 17137749) was aborted. Call getNextException to see the cause.
    at org.springframework.jdbc.support.SQLStateSQLExceptionTranslator.doTranslate(SQLStateSQLExceptionTranslator.java:102)
caused by: java.sql.BatchUpdateException: Batch entry 0 insert into IMAGEDETAILS (HEIGHT, WIDTH, MIMETYPE, ATTACHMENTID) values (482, 630, 'image/jpeg', 17137749) was aborted. Call getNextException to see the cause.
    at org.postgresql.jdbc2.AbstractJdbc2Statement$BatchResultHandler.handleError(AbstractJdbc2Statement.java:2746)
Caused by: java.sql.BatchUpdateException: Batch entry 0 insert into IMAGEDETAILS (HEIGHT, WIDTH, MIMETYPE, ATTACHMENTID) values (482, 630, 'image/jpeg', 17137749) was aborted.  Call getNextException to see the cause.
	at org.postgresql.jdbc2.AbstractJdbc2Statement$BatchResultHandler.handleError(AbstractJdbc2Statement.java:2746)
	at org.postgresql.core.v3.QueryExecutorImpl.processResults(QueryExecutorImpl.java:1887)
	at org.postgresql.core.v3.QueryExecutorImpl.execute(QueryExecutorImpl.java:405)
	at org.postgresql.jdbc2.AbstractJdbc2Statement.executeBatch(AbstractJdbc2Statement.java:2893)
	at sun.reflect.GeneratedMethodAccessor621.invoke(Unknown Source)
	at sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.java:43)
	at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Method.java:498)
	at com.github.gquintana.metrics.proxy.MethodInvocation.proceed(MethodInvocation.java:75)
	at com.github.gquintana.metrics.sql.AbstractStatementProxyHandler.invoke(AbstractStatementProxyHandler.java:64)
	at com.github.gquintana.metrics.proxy.ProxyHandler.invoke(ProxyHandler.java:73)
	at com.sun.proxy.$Proxy525.executeBatch(Unknown Source)
	at org.apache.tomcat.dbcp.dbcp.DelegatingStatement.executeBatch(DelegatingStatement.java:297)
	at org.apache.tomcat.dbcp.dbcp.DelegatingStatement.executeBatch(DelegatingStatement.java:297)
	at org.apache.tomcat.dbcp.dbcp.DelegatingStatement.executeBatch(DelegatingStatement.java:297)
	at net.sf.hibernate.impl.BatchingBatcher.doExecuteBatch(BatchingBatcher.java:54)
	at net.sf.hibernate.impl.BatcherImpl.executeBatch(BatcherImpl.java:128)
	at net.sf.hibernate.impl.SessionImpl.executeAll(SessionImpl.java:2465)
	at net.sf.hibernate.impl.SessionImpl.execute(SessionImpl.java:2419)
	at net.sf.hibernate.impl.SessionImpl.flush(SessionImpl.java:2288)
	at net.sf.hibernate.transaction.JDBCTransaction.commit(JDBCTransaction.java:61)
	at org.springframework.orm.hibernate.HibernateTransactionManager.doCommit(HibernateTransactionManager.java:510)
	... 400 more
caused by:
org.postgresql.util.PSQLException: ERROR: duplicate key value violates unique constraint "imagedetails_pkey"

{noformat}
 
h3. Notes
This occurs with or without assigning a question to a space. It has been reproduced in Confluence Cloud version 1000.122.0 and Questions for Confluence version 2.4.14-D20160504T221817. 

h3.Workaround
Add image attachment as a comment to the question instead of directly in the question.
fields.summary: Cannot save/edit question with image attachment

fields.description: {panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa} *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-47188]. {panel} Product: http://swag.atlassian.com Vulnerability Type: Self Stored Cross site scripting (Cross site scripting) Platform: Leaptop / PC URL: https://id.atlassian.com/profile/signUp.action?continue=http://swag.atlassian.com/Login.aspx OS/Version: Windows 7 Browser: Mozilla Firefox (v 28) Status: NEW Severity: Major Reported By: eh.Yogendra@gmail.com Bug Description: Reproduce steps: 1. Go to http://swag.atlassian.com & Create a Account. 2. Redirect to this Link: https://id.atlassian.com/profile/signUp.action?continue=http://swag.atlassian.com/Login.aspx 3. Fill the First name and Last name with Payload. 4. "> 5. Login successfully then update Display name with "> 6. Now go to My Atlassian 7. Payload executed.
fields.summary: Self Stored Cross site scripting

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-47187].
  {panel}

Unlicensed users can able to ask a question,view, and vote for questions in Question for Confluence.

h3. How to Reproduce

# Install Confluence server with 25 user license
# Add 12 users or more.
# Install Question for Confluence add-on with 10 license users
# Access the Question for Confluence. The message below will appear:
{code}
Questions for Confluence license is not valid.
The license supports fewer users than the application.
{code}
# Login to Confluence as a user
# Ask a question and vote for the question
# Do the same for all remaining users
fields.summary: Unlicensed users in Question for Confluence can still view and ask a question

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-47185].
  {panel}

h3. Summary
Question's owner is not receiving any email notification regarding new answers being posted on the question.

h3. Environment
* Confluence 1000.340.0
* Questions for Confluence Plugin 2.4.14-D20160804T002212

h3. Steps to Reproduce
# Create two users (UserA and UserB)
# Create a test laber (Label1)
# As UserA watch the Label1
# As UserA create a question with Label1
# As UserB post an answer to the question raised in the previous step

h3. Expected Results
UserA should get email notification regarding the answer posted to his question.

h3. Actual Results
* No email notification is sent.
* Error in logs:
{code}
2017-01-13 12:29:45,253 WARN [http-nio-8090-exec-3] [atlassian.confluence.cache.TransactionalCacheFactoryCleaner] lambda$cleaner$2 Forcibly unbound thread-local transactional caches prior to request execution: [com.atlassian.confluence.security.CachingSpacePermissionManager.permissions, com.atlassian.confluence.security.SpacePermissionGroupNamesCache, com.atlassian.confluence.user.crowd.CachedCrowdMembershipDao.STRING_PARENT_CACHE, com.atlassian.confluence.user.crowd.CachedCrowdUserDao.USER_CACHE, com.atlassian.confluence.user.crowd.DefaultApplicationCache]
 -- referer: http://quicksilver:8090/confluence/questions/1048793/tete | url: /confluence/cq/answerquestion.action | traceId: 28211703339576ca | userName: guivianabr2
2017-01-13 12:29:45,289 ERROR [AtlassianEvent::CustomizableThreadFactory-2] [plugins.questions.notification.QuestionsNotificationsSender] sendNotification Error sending notification
 -- url: /confluence/cq/answerquestion.action | traceId: 28211703339576ca | userName: guivianabr2 | referer: http://quicksilver:8090/confluence/questions/1048793/tete | action: answerquestion
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: parameter value cannot be null
	at org.springframework.util.Assert.notNull(Assert.java:115)
	at com.atlassian.confluence.web.UrlBuilder.add(UrlBuilder.java:77)
	at com.atlassian.confluence.plugins.questions.notification.QuestionsNotificationsSender.getWebItemLinks(QuestionsNotificationsSender.java:279)
	at com.atlassian.confluence.plugins.questions.notification.QuestionsNotificationsSender.access$600(QuestionsNotificationsSender.java:54)
	at com.atlassian.confluence.plugins.questions.notification.QuestionsNotificationsSender$1.call(QuestionsNotificationsSender.java:206)
{code}
* If the question's owner answers his question, he *will* receive the notification, however, from other users, he won't.
 
h3. Notes
UserA receives notifications of his question posted (question created).
UserA receives notifications of comments added into an answer.

Enabling "Notify of my own changes" at users' profile level does not affect this.

h3.Workaround
none so far
fields.summary: Question's owner not receiving email notification about new answer posted

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-47183].
  {panel}

I was reminded by following mail last weeks, but I could not follow up on recommendations, because I does not see necessary links, buttons or menu points.

-----

The following questions of yours are still unresolved: 
•	Adjust Configuration of Delegated Directory in resulting in an error message
https://answers.atlassian.com/questions/81106/adjust-configuration-of-delegated-directory-in-resulting-in-an-error-message

Please consider one of the following actions: 
•	Accept an answer (click the grey check mark) 
•	Answer your own question, then accept your answer (find the 'Answer my own question' link underneath your question) 
•	Edit your question for clarification 
•	Add a comment for more information from an existing answer 
•	Close the question, if it's invalid 
Please be a good Answers citizen! 

Accepting answers on resolved questions earns you Karma points, and increases the chances that Answers' top contributors will answer your future questions. If your question is still legitimate and you'd like to await further answers, please do!
fields.summary: Can not flag my own question to answered

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-47182].
  {panel}

If you add a code block with the collapse checkbox checked, there used to be an "expand source" link, but alas no more.

Two ways to reproduce:

1. This question should have an expand-source: https://answers.atlassian.com/questions/17275/announcements-on-answers-again
2. Answer a q, add code, click the Collapse checkbox, then show preview, you see nothing.

cheers, jamie
fields.summary: "expand-source" not working anymore
Swag broken for 10000 karma

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-47180].
  {panel}

h3. Summary
Unanswered questions are not appearing in the Unanswered tab in Questions for Confluence

h3. Environment
* Confluence Cloud version {{6.0.0-OD-2016.12.2-1113}}
* Questions for Confluence version {{2.4.13-D20160201T024702}}

h3. Steps to Reproduce
# Navigate to _Questions for Confluence_
# Create a question.
# Navigate back to _Questions for Confluence_ main page and click the tab *Unanswered*.

h3. Expected Results
A list of unanswered questions.

h3. Actual Results
Empty result with the error:
 !error.png|thumbnail! 

h3. Notes
Content indexing didn't solve the issue.

h3.Workaround
None at the moment.
fields.summary: Unanswered questions are not appearing in the Unanswered tab in Questions for Confluence
Bottom of screen is a different shade of blue
Code block expands URLs

fields.description:

There was so way of retrieving the full text so I ended up having to re-write the entire response.

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-47168].
  {panel}

h3. Problem Definition
Topics for Questions in a restricted space are appearing for users that do not have access to the space.

h3. Steps to Reproduce
# Create Space A and restrict it to only User A.
# Create a question with topic SpaceA in Space A.
# User B logs in and views Topics in Confluence Questions and sees "SpaceA" topic with no questions shown after clicking.

h3. Suggested Solution
If the topic is only in a restricted space, then it shouldn't appear for users that don't have access.
fields.summary: Topics for Questions in a restricted space are appearing for users that do not have access to the space

  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-47150].
  {panel}

Steps to reproduce:

1. Go to Profile.
2. On the right hand side we see "Expertise" section which shows the details of the Confluence questions.
3. Click on the "Most Answered Topics" .

Expected Result:
Questions with tags must be loaded onto the page.

Actual result:
The URL points to https://extranet.atlassian.com/users/null 

Version: Atlassian Confluence 5.8-m26 (Cluster node: d6e9a8b1)

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-47147].
  {panel}

h3. Steps to reproduce
# Create a question in Confluence Questions that will generate an email notification
# Wait seven days (or change the time on the server to be 7 days ahead)
# Click any of the links at the bottom of the email ("Answer this question", "Watch this question", or "Upvote").

h3. Results
A Tomcat error message:

 !401.png|thumbnail! 

h3. Workaround
Click the title of the question in the email to go to Confluence first, then either answer, watch, or upvote from there.

h3. Notes
This is due to the JWT token in the links in the email having a 7-day expiry. There should be some sort of nicer method of showing this to the user than an ugly 401 message with no obvious way to resolve it.
fields.summary: Tomcat 401 error when clicking link from email over 7 days after receiving it
ValidationHash generation should use random.SystemRandom instead of random class

fields.description:
Often when selecting a topic to watch, the selection does not 'stick' and on refresh of the page the topic is unwatched.

Steps to replicate:
# Navigate to /questions/topics
# Select Watch on a topic that currently has 0 questions
# Wait a moment and refresh the page
# Note that the topic has been unwatched

This does not occur for all topics. In the attached clip, notice that the {{active-clinical-notes}} topic remains watched, but the {{confluence}} topic does not.
fields.summary: Watched topics don't always stick

fields.description:
When logging in to answers, logins are against my.atlassian.com. M.A.C. authenticates an upper or lower case login successfully, and returns a success message. However, answers is not case sensitive, and is not recognizing this user. 

This was reported in a different way at:
https://answers.atlassian.com/questions/4762/problem-logging-into-answers-atlassian-com-with-safari-on-an-iphone4
fields.summary: login is case sensitive

An answer which has comments shows the text "show comments (3)" at the bottom.
Click on it, the comments appear and slide down, and the text changes to "hide comments".

When in Atlassian Answers, I get an error message when attempting to click on link https://answers.atlassian.com/questions/54322/loop-through-issue-watchers

When in Atlassian Answers, and NOT signed in, I'm able to view the page (link above) successfully.  As an attempted workaround, I accessed the page (when not signed in) and then tried to sign in, but the page does not recognize me as the user / question owner.

I'm unable to accept the answer as good.

Member ID = Tyler Paulson
https://answers.atlassian.com/users/6562/tyler-paulson/

Thanks so much for your help.

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-47124].
  {panel}

When trying to use https://answers.atlassian.com/ I can't use the Navigation.
When I click on the Browse button I get the following behavior:

*In FireFox* 
None. FF doesn't even show the arrow next to the browse button. It displays https://answers.atlassian.com/#browse in the address bar, but the page isn't loaded. If I copy the link and paste it in a new FF window it just directs me to https://answers.atlassian.com/.
The same behavior can be seen by clicking on my profile or anything else in the Answers menu bar.

"Ask a question" opens the new question dialog, but without the WYSIWYG editor toolbar. Preview doesn't work.

I can't preview/commit comments, too.

*In IE* 
Using the Menu bar just takes a few seconds to load. If I click on "browse", it takes two or three seconds before it opens. Same for the other buttons.

I can't preview my comments either and when I commit one,it reloads the page and my comment is gone. 

Safari seems to behave like FF.

In Chrome everything works perfectly.
fields.summary: Answers Navigation not working well with different browsers

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-47122].
  {panel}

This has been alluded to in other issues in this project but I can't find something for this specifically, and personally I think it's the thing that would deliver most value right now.

So the "accept rate" is the %age of questions the user has accepted an answer for. 

This would stop the answerers wasting time answering questions for people that don't bother accepting the correct answer. 

Also perhaps you should allow moderators to accept answers on questions they didn't ask, although as this is open to gaming perhaps only if they themselves are not the answerer.
fields.summary: implement "accept rate"

fields.description:
h3. Symptoms

Answered questions restricted for a space are duplicated when viewing it by Expert. The issue happens only when Confluence is configured over MS SQL Server.


h3. Steps to Reproduce

# Create a question in Confluence Questions and restrict it for *any space*.
# As a different user, answer it.
# It appears correctly displayed (just once).
# However, when you go to at the “Answers” tab for the person answering the question, the one answer is duplicated.


h3. Diagnosis

MS SQL Server uses the following SQL query to generate the list of answered question in the question tab:
{code}
select * from (
  select distinct "answer"."CONTENTID", "answer"."CREATIONDATE", row_number() over (order by "answer"."CREATIONDATE" desc) as "rn"
from "CONTENT" "answer"
join "CONTENT" "question"
on "answer"."PARENTCCID" = "question"."CONTENTID" and "answer"."PLUGINKEY" = 'com.atlassian.confluence.plugins.confluence-questions:answer'
left join "SPACES" "SPACES"
on "question"."SPACEID" = "SPACES"."SPACEID"
left join "SPACEPERMISSIONS" "SPACEPERMISSIONS"
on "SPACES"."SPACEID" = "SPACEPERMISSIONS"."SPACEID"
where "answer"."PREVVER" is null and "answer"."CONTENTTYPE" = 'CUSTOM' and "answer"."CONTENT_STATUS" = 'current' and "answer"."PLUGINKEY" = 'com.atlassian.confluence.plugins.confluence-questions:answer' and "answer"."CREATOR" = '<USERKEY>' and ("question"."SPACEID" is null or "SPACEPERMISSIONS"."PERMTYPE" = 'VIEWSPACE' and ("SPACEPERMISSIONS"."PERMGROUPNAME" is null and "SPACEPERMISSIONS"."PERMUSERNAME" is null or "SPACEPERMISSIONS"."PERMUSERNAME" = '<USERKEY>' or "SPACEPERMISSIONS"."PERMGROUPNAME" in ('<ALL_THE_USER_GROUP>')))) a where rn > 0 and rn <= 20 order by rn
{code}

The query is selecting the distinct combination of the 3 column (CONTENTID, CREATIONDATE , row_number()). The row_number() function basically assign a number to the selected row. Since this number is always distinct, the combination of the three column will always be distinct which result in the duplicated result. 

The issue does not occur in the MySQL, for example, because it rely on limit to limit the number of selected row:
{code}
select distinct 'answer'.'CONTENTID', 'answer'.'CREATIONDATE'
from 'content' 'answer'
join 'content' 'question'
on 'answer'.'PARENTCCID' = 'question'.'CONTENTID' and 'answer'.'PLUGINKEY' = 'com.atlassian.confluence.plugins.confluence-questions:answer'
left join 'spaces' 'spaces'
on 'question'.'SPACEID' = 'spaces'.'SPACEID'
left join 'spacepermissions' 'spacepermissions'
on 'spaces'.'SPACEID' = 'spacepermissions'.'SPACEID'
where 'answer'.'PREVVER' is null and 'answer'.'CONTENTTYPE' = 'CUSTOM' and 'answer'.'CONTENT_STATUS' = 'current' and 'answer'.'PLUGINKEY' = 'com.atlassian.confluence.plugins.confluence-questions:answer' and 'answer'.'CREATOR' = '<USERKEY>' and ('question'.'SPACEID' is null or 'spacepermissions'.'PERMTYPE' = 'VIEWSPACE' and ('spacepermissions'.'PERMGROUPNAME` is null and `spacepermissions'.'PERMUSERNAME' is null or 'spacepermissions'.'PERMUSERNAME' = '<USERKEY>' or 'spacepermissions'.'PERMGROUPNAME' in ('<ALL_THE_USER_GROUP>')))
order by 'answer'.'CREATIONDATE' desc
limit 20
{code}

h3. Workaround

* Do not restrict the question for a specific space.
* Use a different database, but MS SQL Server
fields.summary: Answers are duplicated in Confluence Question when viewing it by Expert (only in MS SQL Server)

fields.description:
h3. Summary

Questions for Confluence are not showing the correct data related to the ‘Statistics’. At the bottom bar, the data is scrawled.
It was tested browsers like Chrome, Safari and the same error occurs.

See print:

!Screen Shot 2016-04-12 at 4.54.15 PM.png|thumbnail! 

h3. Environment

Confluence - 1000.14.0

h3. Steps to Reproduce
# Go to Confluence and click on ‘Questions’
# Click on ‘Statistics’
# At the bottom bar, the data is wrong.

h3. Expected Results

The system should show the dates.

h3. Actual Results
The bottom bar is showing the incorrect data, the data is scrawled.

h3.Workaround
# There is no workaround.
fields.summary: Questions for Confluence are not showing the correct data related to the ‘Statistics’

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-47113].
  {panel}

When trying to post a new question to the Answers site type some regular text into the editor. Then put a blank line, cursor is set below that line. Then hit the Insert Code item, paste in some code, select a language but even Plain text will do this. Insert it. 
The Code section is put at the top of the Editor and you cannot move it. 
Tried killing browser, tried Firefox, even did a reboot. No difference. 
Try using Preview and it even shows it at the top. 

Tried putting the Code in first, then going above it and tried to add some lines. Instead of inserting regular lines it puts lines within the Code macro area and makes your new text part of the code.
fields.summary: Code Macro always inserts at top of Answers post

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-47112].
  {panel}

h3. Summary
Allowing Anonymous to view "Question", let all Confluence users to have access to create question

h3. Step to replicate
- Enable "Anonymous" user to be able to view Question.
!Selection_127.png|thumbnail!
- Access Question with any Confluence user.
- Create a question

h3. Actual behaviour
Confluence user that does not have a permission to create question, should be included in "Anonymous" group which they can only view question.

h3. Expected behaviour
Confluence user that does not have any permission to create question, should only be able to view it.

h3. Workaround
Disable "Anonymous" view permission.
fields.summary: Allowing Anonymous to view "Question", let all Confluence users to have access to create question

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-47108].
  {panel}

h3. Summary
When a page has multiple Question Lists Macros with "Include Ask a Question button" enabled, multiple pop-ups of 'Ask a question' are loaded when 'Ask a question' is clicked. You aren't able to ask a question, since the drop-down box for space picker isn't loaded. Pressing cancel will dismiss the pop-ups. The last pop-up is valid for users to use to ask the question since the space picker displays properly.

h3. Environment
* Confluence 5.8.13
* Questions for Confluence 2.3.0 - 2.4.2

h3. Steps to Reproduce
# Install Questions for Confluence 2.3.0.
# Create a page with two Questions Lists Macros and enable the "Include Ask a Question button".
# Click 'Ask a Question' button.

h3. Expected Results
* Only one pop-up of 'Ask a Question' loads and be able to add a question successfully.

h3. Actual Results
* Two pop-ups of 'Ask a question' load. Clicking cancel on the first one shows the valid second pop-up.
 
h3. Notes
* Included screenshot showing the empty space picker drop down.

h3.Workaround
* Click Cancel button to dismiss the multiple 'Ask a question' pop-ups until the last one shows up with the valid Space Picker drop down.
fields.summary: 'Ask a question' button loads multiple 'Ask a question' pop-ups when there are multiple Questions List macros in the page

fields.description:
Questions whose title ends with a period cannot be linked to. The result is an HTTP 404 error.

When viewing the list of unanswered questions in CQ, the links to the questions contain the title of the question, as-is. For example:

https://host/display/IMP/questions/23658558/i-have-no-idea-what-to-do.?src=browse

That period is part of the question title. Clicking on the link results in a 404. 

If you paste the link into the browser and remove that trailing period (or escape it with a "\") the page displays.
fields.summary: Questions Ending with Periods Cannot be Linked To

fields.description:
Steps to reproduce :
# Create a Confluence Question and create the label starting with an alphabet and containing special characters. (example : {{Thi$isab@g}})
# Go to  {{<confluence url>/labels/listlabels-alphaview.action}} and you'll find the label there
# Go back to the Question and delete the label and assign it a new alphabetical one without special characters.
# Note that the {{Thi$isab@g}} label is still there.
# Run the SQL query {{select * from label}} and you'll see that the label is not deleted.

Confluence doesn't allow special characters for the labels but in Confluence Question, it does. Somehow, Confluence is unable to delete labels with special characters. 
Even if the label starts with a special character, it can't be seen in {{<confluence url>/labels/listlabels-alphaview.action}} but it exists in the database.

The workaround is to delete it manually in the database using SQl query.
The SQl query is found in [this link|https://answers.atlassian.com/questions/85318/global-delete-labels]. It would be better if Confluence is able to delete special character labels or at least Confluence Question shouldn't allow special characters in its label

{code:sql}
DELETE FROM content_label WHERE labelid IN (SELECT labelid FROM label WHERE name = 'labelname');
DELETE FROM label WHERE name = 'labelname';
{code}
fields.summary: Labels with special characters still appearing in database and UI despite being deleted by the user

h3. Summary
Nothing happens when you click the *Share* button to share a Confluence Question. 

h3. Environment
Confluence Question: 2.4.14-D20160804T002212
Confluenc Cloud: 1000.260.0

h3. Steps to Reproduce
# Log into Confluence instance
# *Questions* > Select any question
# Top Right: click *Share* 

h3. Expected Results
* A pop up should show to be able to type in users

h3. Actual Results
* Nothing happens when you click the *Share* button
* {{***** Analytics log [cq.question.shareclick}} showed on Browser Console
 
h3. Workaround
No current workaround.
fields.summary: Unable to Share Confluence Question
